decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (PC-11-073/02, 048-PE-02-XX-DR-A-0100, 101, 102, 103, 104, 105, 106, Ground Floor Plan, Site Plan received 02/03/2015) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.

Condition : 3 - No demolition or construction work shall take place on the site except between the hours of 8:00am  to 6:00pm on Mondays to Friday and 9 :00am to 1:00pm on Saturdays and none shall take place on Sundays and Public Holidays without the prior agreement of the Local Planning Authority.
Condition : 4 - The materials used for the extensions hereby approved shall be in accordance with the information about materials on page 15 of the submitted Design and Access Statement.
description: Extensions and alterations to school buildings to change the existing two-form entry of primary school into a four-form entry nursery and infant school.
